content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why didn't you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The landlord was not willing to lower the price to the amount that aligned with my budget.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how would you rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement in the future? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement in the future as 1, as the landlord was clear in stating that the offer of 580 Euro per month was final.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended because the negotiation was conducted professionally and respectfully. The disagreement was about the rental price, not about personal characteristics or feelings.
name: Max Müller
